item.description: Hi Ladies, I'm really looking forward to meeting some of you at Kings tomorrow!!  I will be there early checking on available tables and lanes for us to bowl, I'll be wearing a floral shirt and jeans and I will have a list of those who RSVPd for this meetup since we're such a large group.  If you any of you have problems getting there just call Kings at 617-266-2695 and they can direct you. SEE YOU THERE!! Melanie
item.name: drinks,food bowling at Kings!
